fno: In the cash market, the Nifty 50 rose 35.75 points or 0.20% to settle at 18,321.15. The NSE's India VIX, a gauge of market's expectation of volatility over the near term, slipped 4.51% to 12.52. Reliance Industries, HDFC Bank and ICICI Bank were the top traded individual stock futures contracts in F&O segment of NSE. The June 2023 F&O contracts will expire on 29 June 2023.
